title: How to Rejuvenate Tapestry Furniture

steps.headline: Dampen some salt.
steps.description: Do not make it wet, just moist.

steps.headline: Using a soft cloth, rub the dampened salt across the tapestry surface of the piece of furniture.
steps.description: Rub it in well, all over the tapestry covering.

steps.headline: Leave the salt there for half an hour.
Brush the salt off using a soft brush.
steps.description: Brush it into a duster pan and have the vacuum handy to catch salt from the floor. If you have a soft brush attachment to your vacuum and a very gentle sucking mode, you might be able to use the vacuum direct on the tapestry but it is a good idea to be cautious of using such power around delicate threads.

steps.headline: Stand back and admire.
steps.description: The salt should have removed the dust and will have refreshed the colours of the tapestry like new.
